content: the court of appeals in laquila made a final decision on an appeal regarding the division of property the appeal was brought by one of the parties involved cg the court partially accepted the appeal and ruled that the division of property should be based on the will of the deceased the court assigned specific properties including buildings and land in laquila to each party they also determined the amount of money owed to each party and ordered an accounting of rental fees and other expenses the court referred to relevant laws in making their decision this case had been ongoing for 16 years before reaching this final resolution the decision was made on october 9 2018 and filed with the clerks office on november 2 2018
